If I have a script where I want to be able to alternate between CairoMakie and GLMakie backends, and I want to use `Text`, (which has to be specified because clash with Base), how should I do that?
I'm thinking of
```if use_GLMakie # the switch between backends
    using GLMakie
else
    using CairoMakie
end
BACKEND = use_GLMakie ? GLMakie : CairoMakie
BACKEND.Text(...)```
But there's surely something nicer one of you has come up with. If that's the case please let me know!
